value:
If I swindled someone under the
sun's watchful eye, I'd get burnt.
Better not take my chances.

What I wouldn't give for Jehanna's
famous Audhulma ice blade
right now!$k$pBetcha one quick swing of that sword
would cool this place down quick.

Watching the sun set with a drink in
hand is sublime. Why, if Caellach
were here we'd have a smorgasbord.

Why don't you take a dip and relax?
When you're down on luck, the best
remedy is enjoying a change of pace.

How much you wanna bet that I can
slice this watermelon in two on the
very first try?

Hey there. Fancy a coin toss? If you
win, I'll tell you all about the big news
from $Nf.

It feels like the goddess of summer
herself has blessed me with
prosperity. I'm on a roll!

Sometimes you just gotta stop
and feel the warm breeze.

Ugh. And I was betting on my luck
to turn around this summer too!

Not too shabby. I'll surf this wave of
good fortune all the way to the bank.

Beautiful weather and crystal-clear
water... In a place like this, Lady Luck
will surely shine her blessings on me.$k$pWhat's that? Oh, the name's Joshua.
I'm just a mercenary.

My homeland, Jehanna, is a desert.
Except for the southern ocean, it's
all sand for as far as the eye can see.$k$pNot like we don't know what
the beach is, though. I mean, it's
also full of sand, innit?$k$pGotta admit, the ocean breeze here
makes for a pleasant stay. Just can't
get too comfy, else I'll get burned.$k$pI welcome the lulls as much as the
adrenaline. Changes up the pace and
gives time for my luck to recharge.$k$pSo let's make a wager. Heads,
summer vacation continues. Let's see
what dear Lady Luck has in store...
てやっ
ほい！
げっ…
やるな…！
Not bad at all.
Cool your head!
Let's make a wager.
Don't bet on it!
My luck's run out.
ふーん…
I'm no stranger to heat like this. My homeland's practically a desert, after all.
I'm not cheating this time. I swear!
The beach, you say? Heh... Tourists are such easy marks.
Hey, throw some coin my way. Give me one week, and you'll see a major return.
Whew! Swimming is more tiring than it looks... Think I'll take a quick nap...
If only my people could witness this summer sea... My mother would have loved it.
Care to test your luck? No double-sided coins, just a good ol' fashioned swim race.
Hmph. You win.
Over where?
Time to swim.
